title: Teriyaki tofu
author: Danny Burrow
instructions: Press excess water from tofu. Cut into bite-size pieces. Dredge in cornflour. Deep fry. Drain excess oil, then coat in teriyaki sauce. Serve over rice.

title: BBQ Pulled Pork
author: Danny Burrow
instructions: Pat pork shoulder dry and liberally coat with salt and spices. Place on a rack in oven at 225F for 8-12 hours, until roast is fall-apart tender. Cool slightly, then shred. Mix with skimmed and strained pan drippings as desired.

title: Akara Beans Cake
author: sammy kareeem
instructions: soak your peeled beans in water for 4hour to make it soft, In a blender add your soften peeled beans with onions,red bell pepper, add little water then blend till smooth,Pour your paste-like beans in a bowl, then add salt and powdered pepper, mix thoroughly to smoothen all added ingredients, fry in a medium hot oil until golden brown. Enjoy while hot with hot pap or custard

title: Efo riro
author: sammy kareeem
instructions: Blend your pepper and onions not too smooth, Put your palm oil into pot and put your finely cubed onions and locust beans. Put in all your offals, ponmo,stockfish(must have cooked till soft)prawn,crayfish and saute. Pour your blended pepper and stir well till well combined and allow to fry. Add in your bouillon and salt to taste. Allow to fry well till it's dried of water and brings out it's oil. Then add your fined shredded vegetable (Ugwu, Tete,shoko, Igbo). sprinkle salt on the vegetable, pour very hot water on it and stir well, after 5 mins, pour into cold water till it's no more hot, squeeze out the water and mix into your fried stew. Stir well till well combined, taste for the seasoning and ready to serve with your desired swallow.
